title: Reward earned?
body: I just logged into lol and 2 windows popped up saying "Reward earned" you earned a reward.. It was a couple of champions and a couple of skins and i am wondering what/why did that happened?

replies.body:
Aww man ty Porcoles.
You go in collection and see what you already have apparently :/

We've made a[ support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-) for more visibility, but we enabled toast notifications on the updated client.  This resulted in backlogs of old notifications for content you've already obtained to appear.  Nothing new was actually unlocked.  Sorry for the confusion!
The 2 windows popped to me as well, but I have trouble finding  where exactly I have to look to see what my rewards are. Where did you look? Loot, Store? Icons? Where? T_T
